purpose: Serve as the main server for ElevenLabs' MCP, providing core functionalities and API endpoints for interaction.
principle: Built using Python, leveraging web frameworks and APIs to facilitate interaction with ElevenLabs' services.
reusability: Designed to be integrated with other ElevenLabs services via APIs, facilitating extensibility and modularity.
limitations: Being in alpha stage, it may have limited features and possible stability issues.
name: elevenlabs-mcp
